resources.string: Rules of the game: You will have three pieces in front of you, two of them will be numbers. It is necessary that the sum of the numbers from the two lower figures is equal to the number in the upper figure, for this you need to insert the missing number in the right figure.
Example: In the upper circle the number 8, in the left number 3, and in the right question mark. So in place of the question mark there must be the number 5, because 5 + 3 = 8.
The required number of correct answers: %s
The required percentage of correct answers: %s
